channel.title: Posts on David Taitingfong | Chamoru Language & Technology
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on David Taitingfong | Chamoru Language & Technology

item.title: Åpmam na Manugi' Yu' Guini
item.description: Hu prumeti hamyu na ti maleffa yu’ nu ini na “blog” 😁. Ginin i ma’pus na Huliu, hu gof na’siguru na siña yu’ manugi’ guini sa’ masangåni yu’ na ti siña pumo’lu iyo-ku na kod gi publikun sagan kod1, yan kåo un tungu’ månu nai hu po’lu ini na “blog”?… Ha’a, dinanchi!…gi publikun sagan kod! 🙃 Ya pues ti manugi’ “blog” asta ki sen siguru yu’ na siña manugi’ yu’ guini!

item.title: Gi Nuebun Cho'chu', Gi Nuebun Hinanao
item.description: Håfa adai todus hamyu! Hu tungu’ na ti månggi’ gi halacha gi esti na blog 😅, laooo gaigi yu’ guini på’gu! Meeeegagagai na masusedi gi lina’lå’-hu gi ma’pus na mes - gi minagåhit, mampus! 🫠 Guaha maolek yan båba lokkui’ na sinisedi-hu. Fine’nena: i båba siha: Makonni’ i neni-hu para éspitåt (ya masangåni yu’ na buenti gai asthma gui’ 😩) Annai gaigi yu’ giya Guåhan, gumai COVID yu’ (yan todu taotao gi iriyå-hu lokkui’!

item.title: Trongkun Manggafå-hu Pt. 2
item.description: I Trongkun Manggafå-hu På'gu I Bandan Nanå-hu I Bandan Tatå-hu Pues Håfa På'gu? First things first: if you haven’t seen my first post re: my family tree then you can read it here. Okay, nihi ta tutuhun: I’ve been busy, dispensa yu’! I’ve been neck-deep in work and life in general, but I’m here now and I’m excited to share an update on my family tree! 🙌🏽 I wasn’t sure how much further I’d get honestly - I was doing so much research prior to December that I felt I’d found all the info that I could.

item.title: Mama'titinas Diksionårion Chamoru
item.description: Håfa adai todus hamyu guennao huyung ni’ tumataitai esti! It’s been over a month-and-a-half since I’ve blogged and not a week has gone by where I thought to myself, “ai adai, debi di bai fa’tinas otru na blog”, but honestly my schedule has just been todu machalapon. I had to take a step back from dang near everything and reasses my priorities and how I spend my time outside of work - hence my absence 😅.

item.title: Mama'titinas Trongkun Manggåfa
item.description: I’ve been on a journey to document my family tree in a tech-saavy way. It started off simple: try and find out who my great-grandparents were. I honestly didn’t think I’d get past that because before this I couldn’t even tell you the names of any of my great-grandparents. But as you’ll soon find out, my simple task turned into a research-heavy adventure which is still ongoing. This wasn’t on my to-do list until recently - I’d say within the last 2 years.

item.title: Ha'ånen "Liberasión"
item.description: TW/CW: Mentions of war. I can’t recall a time when my family celebrated “Liberation Day”. I can recall times that we volunteered at the Sons & Daughters of Guam Club for Liberation fiestas: cleaning, cooking, setting up & breaking down, etc…but being young, I wasn’t interested in the “whys” of fiestas. But celebrating at home? Tåya’. I’m positive there’s complexities behind that. I mean, growing up I only ever heard one story about the war from my dad’s mom.

item.title: Hu Fa'mamaolek Esti na Blog
item.description: Håfa adai todus hamyu guennao huyung! Hu tungu’ na tumaigui yu’ giya guini, lao hu prometi hamyu na ti åpmam bai tutuhun månggi’ guini. Buenti gumuaha tiempo-ku gi mamaila’ na semåna, lao siempri gi mamaila’ na mes - puedi ti mås anåkku’ sa’ malago’ yu’ fa’maolek esti na blog. Bai hu tulaika i “theme” ya hu tungu’ na gumuaha meggai tinilaika siha ni’ hu chek pat chagi. Todu ha’ para på’gu.

item.title: Kumeke'etsisiu Yu' Kada Ha'åni
item.description: Cha’-hu dagi hamyu. Kumahulo’ yu’ gi taftaf ogga’an kada ha’åni ya ti malago’ ha’ yu’ umetsisiu. Hu tungu’ na etsisiu u na’labråbu yu’, lao mapput para hu sodda’ i metgot-hu. LAO magåhet na kumeke’etsisiu yu’ kada ogga’an, pat atu’åsi kada ha’åni…pat kada semåna, haha. Esta hu chachagi kumånnu’ labråbun néngkanu: meggai gollai, meggai golosina, ya ti hu chagi kumånnu’ mampus kåtni (lao hu chagi kumånnu’ néngkanu ginen i tasi kada siña yu’.

item.title: Biba Mes Chamoru!
item.description: Håfa adai todus hamyu guennao huyung! På’gu na ha’åni i tinituhun-ña nu Mes Chamoru! Hu tungu’ na ti sessu mångge’ yu’ guini, lao hu prometi hamyu na hu chachagi! Kada diha gof tinani’ ha’ yu’: guaha mampus che’cho’-hu, guaha mampus tarehan guma’ put eskuela, ya manhåhalom ha’ ham yan i manggafå-hu gi un nuebun guma'. Ai adai, fannå’i yu’ i animås-miyu fan. Siempri bai kefångge’ guini, kolo’lo’ña sa’ på’gu i Mes Chamoru.

item.title: Guaha Mampus Para Cho'gui
item.description: Ai adai, dispensa na gof atrasao ini na blog! Gi minagåhet, sen tinani’ yu’ lao guaha maolek na rason na taiguini. Na’kadada’ un anåkku’ na istoria: ti apmam bai in fañåga gi nuebun guma’, yan i mañainå-hu yan che’lu-hu. Ohala’ mohon na ti apmam siña månggi’ yu’ kosa ki siña hu sangåni hamyu håfa nuebu gi lina’lå’-hu. Esta otro tiempu nai! Todu ha’ para på’gu. Bula guinaiya! — DJT. English Translation My goodness, apologies for this late blog!

item.title: I Lahi-hu Kumpreprendi i Ilelek-hu
item.description: Kada diha hu usa fino’ Chamoru gi i gima’-hu yan i familiå-ku, i asaguå-hu yan i lahi-hu, si Lorie yan si Leo. Gi minagåhet, ti sessu hu usa nuebu na palåbra siha yan siha, lao siempri hu adingani siha gi fino’ Chamoru. Guaha na biåhi na hu ke’usa nuebu na palåbra siha, piót yan i lahi-hu, ya kada diha siña manli’i’ yu’ na ha na’la’tungu’ gui’. Hu tungu’ na ha kumprendi annai hu sangåni gui':

item.title: Minalago' Siha Para I Tinilaikan I Sakkan
item.description: Håfa adai todus hamyu! Guaha un nuebun såkkan ya malago’ yu’ pumåtti hamyu ni hinasso-ku siha para iyo-ku blog para i mamaila’ såkkan. Guaha ideha-hu siha na hinasso-ku siempri na’dångkulu i tiningu’-hu gi Fino’ Chamoru, ya eyu nai bai månggi’ put: Manggafå-hu Nengkånu’ ni’ chumocho yan mama’tinas yu' Lepblo-ku siha ni’ manaitai yu' Todu kosas gi Tek Esta månggi’ yu’ ni manggafå-hu lao ya-hu bai månggi’ nu nengkånu’, lepblo siha, yan tek, kulolo’ña put siguridát gi tek.

item.title: Magof Påsgua Nochebuena 2020
item.description: Håfa adai todus hamyu yan Magof Påsgua Nochebuena para siha ni’ mañilebra. Christmas time for me today has shifted mostly towards i bandan asaguå-hu. Gi minagåhet, hagas ha’ hu silebra Nochebuena yan i familiå-ña. On my side of the family we tend to split time between my dad’s side and my mom’s side. Even then, those parties tend to be closer to New Years or after, i.e., my family tends to celebrate Christmas after New Years — ya maolek-ña i “sales” dispues di New Years ki antes, hunggan?

item.title: Kasiyas 2020
item.description: Hu tugi’ ini na poem para Kasiyas 2020; put hu sohyu’ todus hamyu para konsigi fumino’ Chamoru. Yanggen malago’ hao umegga’, siña hao gi Facebook –> click here (manaitai yu’ gi ~45 minutes 👍🏼) — translation below poem Fino’ Chamoru Mungnga ma’å’ñao fumino’ Chamoru, Achokka’ ennao muna’ma’å’ñao hao. Achokka’ hinasso-mu na mapput para hågu, Maolekña kumekefino’ ki pumåpara Siña un tutuhun på’gu na ha’åni, Lao maolek ha’ yanggen ti siña hao.

item.title: Adingani i Lahi-hu Pt. 2
item.description: I finene’na na blog guini. Buenas yan håfa adai todus hamyu! Åpmam na tiempu na månggi’ yu’ guini, hunggan? Gi minagåhet, gof tinani’ yu’ desde ki tåtti hugua na pulan. Kada diha hu ripiti ta’lu na bidå-hu: makmåta yu’ yan etsisiu pat chochu, pues macho’chu’, ya pues hugåndu yan i lahi-hu. Todu eyu ha tifi’ yu’, lol. I asunto put ini na blog kosa ki hu mås påtti hamyu ni taiminapput sinångan siha na hu sangåni i lahi-hu.

item.title: Mampus Chaddek i Lahi-hu
item.description: Kada diha, hu li’i’ malålagu i lahi-hu gi uriyan guma’-måmi. Gaigi gui’ gi me’nan potta, pues ha malågu hålum i kuatton-måmi, pues gaigi gui’ gi tatti yu’ pat fi’on-hu. Ai adai, guaha na biåhi ti siña hu sodda’ i tiempu para dumeskånsa. Lao gi minagåhet, eyu ha na’magof yu’ sa’ hu lili’i’ gui’ dumångkulu; mås chumachålek gui’, gof ya-ña humugågandu yan hami yan si Lorie asaguå-hu, ya bula kumukuentus gui'!

item.title: Adingani i Lahi-hu
item.description: Note: updated 2020-12-22 by removing reference to my since-deleted write.as blog. Most of the Chamoru that I’ve been using lately is towards i lahi-hu. Håcha na såkkan idåt-ña, pues inadingan-måmi ni ti mapput. I wanted to share some of those phrases with you and perhaps get some feedback. If you’re here then I’ll assume you came from Twitter, IG, or some other social media site. Feel free to hit me up on any of those.

item.title: I Tinituhon
item.description: Note: Updated 2020-12-22 with added English title. Buenas yan håfa adai todus hamyu! Guahu i che’lun-miyu as David Taitingfong ya ini iyo-ku na blog ni’ un taitaitai. I’ve been meaning to get this space started for some time but, if I’m being honest, so many things have gotten in my way - and by many things I mean myself and the plethora of projects that I can’t seem to stop accruing.
